com.cutterapi.http

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cutterapi.http.Request
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GetRequest, PostRequest

    public class Request
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the superclass for PostRequest and GetRequest This conatins all methods that are used in the specific request-classes except the request()-methods
    Author:
    Phil Niehus

    • Constructor Detail

      • Request

        public Request()

      • Request

        public Request(java.lang.String url,
               java.lang.String[] params,
               java.lang.String[] values,
               java.lang.String mimetype)
        Parameters:
        url - A String that contains the target-url
        params - A String[] containing the names of the parameters
        values - A String[] that contains for the parameters (has to be in the same order like params)
        mimetype - A String containing the MIME-type for the post-request, default is like an html-form and can be used with php

      • Request

        public Request(java.lang.String url,
               java.lang.String[] params,
               java.lang.String[] values)
        Parameters:
        url - A String that contains the target-url (Without '?xyz=')
        params - A String[] containing the names of the parameters
        values - A String[] that contains for the parameters (has to be in the same order like params)
